nodes.text: A bartender droid, robo-bartender, robotender, or mixicologist droid was a droid designed to serve in cantinas and bars. One worked at Leatherback's on Sriluur, but the owner had to get rid of it when the droid-hating Yuuzhan Vong invaded. Some bartender droids were simply repurposed droids of other types -- famously, R2-D2 aboard the Khetanna and the modified protocol droids at the Cluster cantina.
Cybot Galactica produced the MixRMastR model, while another model was the LeisureMech Enterprises C5 bartender droid.
